body: This should not be called `if_polly`.  Given what it does today, it should be called `append_polly_dep_if_enabled`, though I think it is better to have a `polly_component_if_available` function that returns `["@llvm//:polly"]` if polly is enabled else returns an empty list; and explicitly appending `polly_component_if_available()` in the `deps` for various rules.
